title: Manual Control Function Block
description: This function block implements a manual control mechanism that takes various input signals to control the output state and status. It handles input signals for manual control, set, reset, and immediate input status, providing appropriate outputs based on the state of these signals.
name: MANUAL_1

input.name: IN
input.description: Input signal that determines the output state when manual control is not active.

input.name: MAN
input.description: Manual control signal to enable manual operation.

input.name: M_I
input.description: Immediate input signal that defines the output state when manual control is inactive.

input.name: SET
input.description: Set signal to transition the output state to TRUE.

input.name: RST
input.description: Reset signal to transition the output state to FALSE.

output.name: Q
output.description: Output signal representing the current state controlled by the function block.

output.name: STATUS
output.description: Status code indicating the current state of the function block.
